game.name: My Burger Biz
game.description:
Cooking is a passion and fun for many girls irrespective of their age. And, this fun might be double if they get a chance to prepare something really delicious like burger in the kitchen. Today we have brought a brand new cooking simulation game to all those who want to learn how to cook burgers, but unable to practice it in their real kitchen. Join My Burger Biz game and get ready to learn what it takes to create the most scrumptious burger! Your safe hands will help to set a successful burger business. 

It is time to follow some important steps in your restaurant. Do not need to bother as you will have plenty of good items to use in this one of the most popular girls games! All you need to do is check continuously if you also have a stock of them. Also take a look into the estimate as it will be responsible for affecting the choices of customers in burgers. Perform wisely and try to purchase some promotional materials to improve your brand awareness and attract more eyeballs in this html5 burger game!

Follow the instructions and prepare your own burger recipe! Your alertness and good hands will help make your burger more scrumptious and increase its cost as well. Change your locations and keep selling it there. May be you will be able to collect more money in your nearby wealthier neighborhoods! Keep playing around and good luck to grow your business in a way nobody did that in the past! Experiment as much ingredients as you can to prepare the most amazingly delicious burger recipe in this mobile food game. Play it in almost all browsers without downloading app!
